message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is about emotion cause identification in text, which is a natural language processing task. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also proposes a neural network architecture to integrate different types of information, which involves machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) another likely sub-category. The use of deep learning methods also suggests cs.LG (Machine Learning) as a possible sub-category. The task of identifying potential causes of emotions in text can also be seen as a form of information retrieval, which falls under cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the use of a benchmark dataset and experimental evaluation suggests cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) as a possible sub-category.
